# person

**Instance Property**

The contact record being displayed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var person: ABPerson! { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the value of this property is `nil`, the view displays a special empty-selection UI.

An exception is raised if the value of this property comes from a shared instance of the address book database. To prevent this, use the [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABAddressBook/addressBook] method of [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABAddressBook] rather than the [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABAddressBook/shared()] method.

## Working with Person Views

- **editing**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the person view is in editing mode.
- **shouldShowLinkedPeople**: Indicates whether the person view should display data from person records that are linked with the person record being displayed.
